CheckDnsNameAvailabilityWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, Dictionary<String, List<String>>, CancellationToken) CheckDnsNameAvailabilityWithHttpMessagesAsync(String, String, Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)), CancellationToken)

Edit

Checks whether a domain name in the cloudapp.net zone is available for use.

public Task<AzureOperationResponse<DnsNameAvailabilityResult>> CheckDnsNameAvailabilityWithHttpMessagesAsync(string location, string domainNameLabel = null, Dictionary<string, List<string>> customHeaders = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Public Function CheckDnsNameAvailabilityWithHttpMessagesAsync(location As String, domainNameLabel As String = Nothing, customHeaders As Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String)) = Nothing, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of AzureOperationResponse(Of DnsNameAvailabilityResult))
Parameters
location
String String

The location of the domain name.

domainNameLabel
String String

The domain name to be verified. It must conform to the following regular expression: ^[a-z][a-z0-9-]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$.

customHeaders
Dictionary<String, List<String>> Dictionary(Of String, List(Of String))

Headers that will be added to request.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The cancellation token.

Returns
Task<AzureOperationResponse<DnsNameAvailabilityResult>> Task(Of AzureOperationResponse(Of DnsNameAvailabilityResult))
Exceptions
ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

Thrown when a required parameter is null
